definition: erotic (loanword mimicking the shape of Japanese katakana エロ, pronounced "ero")
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: I'll start near the hentai bookstore and work my way out.
sentences.chinese: 我准备动身去工口书店然后从那里开始找起。

sentences.english: I'm stuck between banning porn or shutting down the site.
sentences.chinese: 我现在纠结的是要禁掉工口还是关闭掉萌妹。

definition: erotic animation/hentai/(loanword from Japanese 裏番組 "ura bangumi")
lolicon or rorikon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young girls in an erotic manner
fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
otaku, a Japanese term for people with obsessive interests such as anime, manga, and video games/see also 宅男[zhai2 nan2]/see also 宅女[zhai2 nu:3]
voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
three-dimensional/the real world (cf. 二次元[er4 ci4 yuan2])
shotacon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young boys in an erotic manner
Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]
age when girls start to develop feelings for the opposite sex/puberty
